pr_title: Enable job-level serializer for IMDG Lists

timeline.message: Enable job-level serializer for IMDG Lists

timeline.bodyText: did we really need both data iterator and sublist here? seems unnecessary. you can just get sublist(0, size) when size <= FETCH_SIZE
timeline.author: cangencer

replies.bodyText: I wanted to keep the existing behavior but maybe it could be simplified indeed.... 🤔
replies.author: gierlachg
